caption.title: Changes in temperature, number of frost free days and precipitation from 1981 to 2010 at the Quzhou Experimental Station.
caption.p: ( a) The annual maximum, mean, and minimum temperatures (Tmax, Tmean, and Tmin); ( b) The number of available growing degree days; ( c) The number of frost free days; and ( d) Precipitation. ** P < 0.05.
